languages.text: "Кровавая паутина сплетает нитями веры отсеки корабля — таково наше служение Домини из рода фон Валанциус. Неумирающий повелел им бороздить пустоту на корабле, и долгом нашим стало беречь эту бесценную реликвию — твой бесценный род и ковчег, что стал домом сего рода. Великая реликвия из крови и адамантиума".

"The Bloodspun Web holds the bays of the flagship together with the threads of its faith — such is our service to the Domini of the von Valancius line. The Undying One commanded the Domini to embark on a ship and sail the void's expanse. And thus it became our duty to protect your dynasty and the ark that became its home — this great relic of blood and adamantine."
languages.original_text: "Кровавая паутина сплетает нитями веры отсеки корабля — таково наше служение Домини из рода фон Валанциус. Неумирающий повелел им бороздить пустоту на корабле, и долгом нашим стало беречь эту бесценную реликвию — твой бесценный род и ковчег, что стал домом сего рода. Великая реликвия из крови и адамантиума".

traits.locale_text: "The Bloodspun Web holds the flagship's bays together with the threads of its faith — such is our service to the Enims of the von Valancius line. In ages past, the Undying One turned His gaze to those who bore your blood. He commanded that they embark on a ship and sail the void's expanse. And thus it became our duty to protect this most precious treasure — the house that had received His favour, and the ark that had become its home. A great relic of blood and adamantine."

"The Bloodspun Web holds the flagship's bays together with the threads of its faith — such is our service to the Enims of the von Valancius line. In ages past, the Undying One turned His gaze to those who bore your blood. He commanded that they embark on a ship and sail the void's expanse. And thus it became our duty to protect this most precious treasure — the house that had received His favour, and the ark that had become its home. A great relic of blood and adamantine."

And thus it became our duty to protect this priceless treasure — the family who received His favour, and the ark that became their home... It is a great relic of blood and adamantine."

languages.text: «La Red Sanguinolenta mantiene unidos los compartimentos de la nave insignia con los hilos de su fe; tal es el servicio que prestamos a los Domini de la dinastía von Valancius. El Inmortal encomendó a los Domini que embarcasen en una nave y navegasen por la amplia extensión del vacío. Y, así, se convirtió en nuestro deber proteger a su dinastía y al arca que se convirtió en su hogar, esta insigne reliquia de sangre y adamantino».
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web holds the bays of the flagship together with the threads of its faith — such is our service to the Domini of the von Valancius line. The Undying One commanded the Domini to embark on a ship and sail the void's expanse. And thus it became our duty to protect your dynasty and the ark that became its home — this great relic of blood and adamantine."

traits.locale_text: «La Red Sanguinolenta mantiene unidos los compartimentos de la nave insignia con los hilos de su fe; tal es el servicio que prestamos a los Domini de la dinastía von Valancius. El Inmortal encomendó a los Domini que embarcasen en una nave y navegasen por la amplia extensión del vacío. Y, así, se convirtió en nuestro deber proteger a su dinastía y al arca que se convirtió en su hogar, esta insigne reliquia de sangre y adamantino».

«La Red Sanguinolenta mantiene unidos los compartimentos de la nave insignia con las hebras de su fe; tal es el servicio que prestamos a los Enims de la dinastía von Valancius. En el pasado, el Inmortal posó su mirada sobre sus antepasados y les encomendó que se embarcasen en este bajel y navegasen por la amplia extensión del vacío. Y así se convirtió en nuestro deber proteger la dinastía que había recibido Su favor, y el arca que se convirtió en su hogar, esta insigne reliquia de sangre y adamantino».

languages.text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブは、その信念の糸で旗艦のベイを繋いでいる。それがフォン・ヴァランシウス家の、ドミンに対する使命よ。不死の者はドミンに船に乗り、虚空のエクスパンスを航海せよと命じられた。こうして陛下の王朝と、その故郷である箱舟、つまりこの血とアダマンチウムの偉大な遺物を守ることが、私たちの役目となった」
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web holds the bays of the flagship together with the threads of its faith — such is our service to the Domini of the von Valancius line. The Undying One commanded the Domini to embark on a ship and sail the void's expanse. And thus it became our duty to protect your dynasty and the ark that became its home — this great relic of blood and adamantine."

traits.locale_text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブは、その信念の糸で旗艦のベイを繋いでいる。それがフォン・ヴァランシウス家の、ドミンに対する使命よ。不死の者はドミンに船に乗り、虚空のエクスパンスを航海せよと命じられた。こうして陛下の王朝と、その故郷である箱舟、つまりこの血とアダマンチウムの偉大な遺物を守ることが、私たちの役目となった」
「ブラッドスパン・ウェブは、その信念の糸で旗艦のベイを繋いでいる。それがフォン・ヴァランシウス家の、エニムに対する使命よ。太古の昔、不死の者はあなたの血を引く者たちにその目を向けられた。主は彼らに船に乗り、虚空のエクスパンスを後悔せよと命じられた。こうして、主の寵愛を受けた王朝と、その故郷である箱舟、つまりこの血とアダマンチウムの偉大な遺物を守ることが、私たちの役目となった」

languages.text: “织血罗网用它的信仰之线，将旗舰众多甲板牢牢系在一起，这就是我们侍奉冯·瓦兰修斯家族诸位秘者的方式。不死之神命令诸位秘者踏上舰船，在虚空中航行。因此，我们有责任守护你的王朝，守护这艘由鲜血与精金构成的伟大方舟。”
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web holds the bays of the flagship together with the threads of its faith — such is our service to the Domini of the von Valancius line. The Undying One commanded the Domini to embark on a ship and sail the void's expanse. And thus it became our duty to protect your dynasty and the ark that became its home — this great relic of blood and adamantine."

traits.locale_text: “织血罗网用它的信仰之线，将旗舰众多甲板牢牢系在一起，这就是我们侍奉冯·瓦兰修斯家族诸位秘者的方式。不死之神命令诸位秘者踏上舰船，在虚空中航行。因此，我们有责任守护你的王朝，守护这艘由鲜血与精金构成的伟大方舟。”
“织血罗网用它的信仰之线，将旗舰众多甲板牢牢系在一起，这就是我们侍奉冯·瓦兰修斯家族列位秘者的方式。在过去的岁月里，不死之神将目光投向了与你有着相同血脉的人们。祂命令他们踏上舰船，在虚空中航行。因此，我们有责任守护这个受祂祝福的王朝，守护这艘由鲜血与精金构成的伟大方舟。”

languages.text: "Das Blutgesponnene Netz hält die Buchten des Flaggschiff mit den Fäden seines Glaubens zusammen – das ist unser Dienst für die Domini der Linie derer von Valancius. Der Todlose befahl den Domini, an Bord eines Schiffes zu gehen und die Ausdehnung der Leere zu bereisen. Und somit wurde es unsere Pflicht, Eure Dynastie und die Arche, die ihre Heimat wurde, zu schützen – dieses große Relikt aus Blut und Adamant."
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web holds the bays of the flagship together with the threads of its faith — such is our service to the Domini of the von Valancius line. The Undying One commanded the Domini to embark on a ship and sail the void's expanse. And thus it became our duty to protect your dynasty and the ark that became its home — this great relic of blood and adamantine."

traits.locale_text: "Das Blutgesponnene Netz hält die Buchten des Flaggschiff mit den Fäden seines Glaubens zusammen – das ist unser Dienst für die Domini der Linie derer von Valancius. Der Todlose befahl den Domini, an Bord eines Schiffes zu gehen und die Ausdehnung der Leere zu bereisen. Und somit wurde es unsere Pflicht, Eure Dynastie und die Arche, die ihre Heimat wurde, zu schützen – dieses große Relikt aus Blut und Adamant."

"Das Blutgesponnene Netz hält die Buchten des Flaggschiff mit den Fäden seines Glaubens zusammen – das ist unser Dienst für die Enims der Linie derer von Valancius. In früheren Zeiten wendete der Todlose Seinen Blick jenen zu, die Euer Blut in sich trugen. Er befahl ihnen, an Bord eines Schiffes zu gehen und die Ausdehnung der Leere zu bereisen. Und somit wurde es unsere Pflicht, die Dynastie zu beschützen, die Seine Gunst erhalten hatte, und die Arche, die ihre Heimat wurde – dieses große Relikt aus Blut und Adamant."

languages.text: « La Toile de Sang assure la cohésion au sein du vaisseau amiral par l'intermédiaire des fils de sa foi, telle est notre mission au service des Domini de la lignée von Valancius. L'Immortel a ordonné aux Domini de sillonner l'espace intersidéral à bord d'un vaisseau. C'est ainsi que nous est échu le devoir de protéger votre dynastie, et l'arche qui est devenue son foyer, cette fabuleuse relique de sang et d'adamantine. »
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web holds the bays of the flagship together with the threads of its faith — such is our service to the Domini of the von Valancius line. The Undying One commanded the Domini to embark on a ship and sail the void's expanse. And thus it became our duty to protect your dynasty and the ark that became its home — this great relic of blood and adamantine."

traits.locale_text: « La Toile de Sang assure la cohésion au sein du vaisseau amiral par l'intermédiaire des fils de sa foi, telle est notre mission au service des Domini de la lignée von Valancius. L'Immortel a ordonné aux Domini de sillonner l'espace intersidéral à bord d'un vaisseau. C'est ainsi que nous est échu le devoir de protéger votre dynastie, et l'arche qui est devenue son foyer, cette fabuleuse relique de sang et d'adamantine. »

« La Toile de Sang assure la cohésion au sein du vaisseau amiral par l'intermédiaire des fils de sa foi, telle est notre mission au service des Enims de la lignée von Valancius. Jadis, l'Immortel s'est tourné vers vos ancêtres et il leur a ordonné de sillonner l'espace intersidéral à bord d'un vaisseau. C'est ainsi que nous est échu le devoir de protéger la dynastie élue par Ses soins, et l'arche qui est devenue son foyer, cette fabuleuse relique de sang et d'adamantine. »

languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web holds the bays of the flagship together with the threads of its faith — such is our service to the Domini of the von Valancius line. The Undying One commanded the Domini to embark on a ship and sail the void's expanse. And thus it became our duty to protect your dynasty and the ark that became its home — this great relic of blood and adamantine."

languages.text: "Kanipi Ağı, bu sancak gemisinin bölmelerini inancının iplikleriyle örüp bir araya getirmiştir... Von Valancius soyunun Dominlerine hizmetimiz bu şekildedir. Ölmeyen, Dominlere bu gemiye binip uçsuzun enginliğinde yelken açmalarını buyurmuştur. Böylelikle bizim vazifemiz de bu hanedanlığı ve yurt bildiği arkı korumak olmuştur... Bu gemi; kandan ve adamantinden yapılma, ulu bir yadigârdır."
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web holds the bays of the flagship together with the threads of its faith — such is our service to the Domini of the von Valancius line. The Undying One commanded the Domini to embark on a ship and sail the void's expanse. And thus it became our duty to protect your dynasty and the ark that became its home — this great relic of blood and adamantine."
